  CLE: 00

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Add your scores here

```{r, echo=FALSE}
scores <- 
  tibble::tribble(
~Name,       ~LSU, ~CLE,
"Freels",     00,   00,
"Chale",      00,   00,
"Ciaravino",  00,   00,
"Hufstetler", 42,   -Inf,
"Lieby",      00,   00,
"Mayo",       00,   00, 
"Spangler",   00,   00,
"Walton",     00,   00,
"Williams",   00,   00
)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
scores$diff <- abs(scores$LSU - params$LSU) + abs(scores$CLE - params$CLE)

scores$rank <- rank(scores$diff)
scores[order(scores$rank),]
```
